description: This file defines a Spring configuration class that customizes the Feign client logging level to FULL for more detailed request/response logging.

classes.name: CustomFeignClientConfiguration
classes.description: A Spring configuration class that provides a custom bean to set the Feign client's logging level to FULL.

methods.name: feignLoggerLevel
methods.description: Defines a bean that sets the Feign logging level to FULL for detailed logging.
